definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom

sentences.english: Cultural garbage is the main reason to bring out youngsters crime.
sentences.chinese: 文化垃圾是诱发青少年犯罪的重要原因。

sentences.english: Youth and juveniles are the main part of immoralities on web.
sentences.chinese: 青少年是互联网上不道德行为的重要主体。

sentences.english: Moral and em o tional education is rather essential in teenagers' moral development.
sentences.chinese: 道德情感教育对青少年道德成长具有重要作用。

sentences.english: The health of adolescents also has an intergenerational effect.
sentences.chinese: 青少年健康也有代际影响。

sentences.english: We court risk more avidly as teens than at any other time.
sentences.chinese: 法庭审讯青少年的冒险行为比其他任何时候都多。

sentences.english: The young who break the law & commit a crime are both vermin & victims .
sentences.chinese: 违法犯罪的青少年既是害人者，又是受害者。

sentences.english: School-aged children and teens need at least 9 hours of sleep a day.
sentences.chinese: 学龄童和青少年每天至少睡9小时。

sentences.english: Unable to control themselves, some teenagers get hooked by online games.
sentences.chinese: 由于缺乏自控能力，一些青少年迷恋于网上游戏。

sentences.english: Being drunk or high can impact teens’ judgment and decision making skills.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒或吸毒会影响青少年的判断能力和做决定的技能。

sentences.english: The optimal management of femoral fractures in adolescents is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 对于青少年股骨骨折的最佳治疗现仍存在争议。

sentences.english: How do children and teens experience depression?
sentences.chinese: 儿童和青少年如何感受抑郁？

sentences.english: Teenagers experience a feeling of isolation.
sentences.chinese: 青少年饱尝了一种孤立感。

sentences.english: Our country young people computer-related crime phenomenon is day by day prominent.
sentences.chinese: 我国的青少年计算机犯罪现象日益突出。

sentences.english: We will attach importance to teachers' professional ethics and moral instruction of children.
sentences.chinese: 注重师德师风建设，加强青少年思想道德教育。

sentences.english: Teenagers have nothing better to do.
sentences.chinese: 青少年们没有更好的事情可做。

sentences.english: Indeed, youth development was the theme of Tuesday’s postmatch remarks.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，青少年发展是周二赛后演讲的主题。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
